headline: Ask HN: How will a Russian economic collapse affect the US?
description:
Seems negligent, except for energy.

[1] Oil boost production plan: https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/wireStory/gop-end-russian-oil-imports-us-boost-production-83207789

[2] US Top Trading Partners: https://www.census.gov/foreign-trade/statistics/highlights/toppartners.html

[3] 'Russian economy is set for a free fall': White House adviser on sanctions https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCiJV-UJJ6c
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 俄罗斯经济崩溃将如何影响美国？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 俄羅斯經濟崩潰將如何影響美國？
description_zh-Hans:
似乎是疏忽了，除了能源。

[1] 石油提振生产计划：https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/wireStory/gop-end-russian-oil-imports-us-boost-production-83207789

[2] 美国最大贸易伙伴：https://www.census.gov/foreign-trade/statistics/highlights/toppartners.html

[3] "俄罗斯经济将自由落体"。白宫顾问谈制裁 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCiJV-UJJ6c
